Name: An Indie Game a Month: Unreal Journey
About the game: This is early access to what will eventually be 12 different games included in this package. The entry for January - Platformer 'Brave Little Cat' contains 10 different levels with 2D and 3D platformer elements and a short bonus level. The basic gameplay is jumping over obstacles, avoiding colliding with enemies and collecting 3 purple crystals that will allow you to be transported to the next level once you reach the Runestones. January February March April I will be documenting my progress and sharing the blueprints of the games on my youtube channel, showcasing what a beginner can achieve and hopefully it helps more people to create games.
